name: Timothy WALKER, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPT OF CORRECTIONS AT ALBION, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Walker v. Commonwealth, Dept. of Corrections

parties: Timothy WALKER, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPT OF CORRECTIONS AT ALBION, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of December, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus Relief is granted. The Department of Corrections is directed to comply with the order of the Philadelphia County Common Pleas Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
938 A.2d 981
Timothy WALKER, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPT OF CORRECTIONS AT ALBION, Respondent.
No. 97 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 11, 2007.
